question: <image 1> On the basis of style, this work can be attributed to which of the following periods?
description: The image depicts a highly detailed stone carving featuring a central figure with outstretched wings, surrounded by numerous smaller figures. The central figure appears to be an angel or a divine being, and the smaller figures seem to be engaged in various activities, possibly representing scenes from religious narratives. The carving is executed in a relief style, with deep grooves and raised elements creating a sense of depth and movement. The overall composition is symmetrical and structured, with clear delineation between different sections of the artwork. The figures are depicted with elongated bodies and stylized features, characteristic of a particular artistic period.
